title: Hour 3 - Roughing Calls, Ron Rivera Throws Carson Wentz Under the Bus
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Roughing Calls, Ron Rivera Throws Carson Wentz Under the Bus
description:
Dan revisits the changes in the NFL roughing the passer calls. And he addresses Washington Commanders HC Ron Rivera's implication that his team is struggling because they don't have a good enough QB.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
